about_the_game:
Skyfall is an ultra-modernized, story rich RPG with advanced combat mechanics.

Features

  • NPC Testing - Spectate a large sandbox-like map of NPCs reacting to environmental stimuli.

  • Attack Testing - Spectate NPCs reacting to attacks. Different NPCs will run away from the point of damage, call for help, or investigate.

  • Movement Testing - Play as a test character! Familiarize yourself with controls, abilities, and weapon types in the player sandbox. Here, you will see different types of effects, projectiles and friendly weapons following and reacting to your movement / input.

Future Features

  • Debug UI Elements - Damage Indicators, healthbars, NPC states. Sandboxes will be simplified by the ability to click on an entity to view its information. E.G: Hovering over an NPC will display information about its current state, goals and story-related information.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains unrealistic scenes of violence.
